title: Contract Photographer - Real Estate
description:
We are a Phoenix-based real estate research firm with a contract available for individuals with photography experience and reliable transportation!
Photographers should be located in or willing to travel around the Iowa City area to take exterior property photographs of Multi-Family and Self-Storage properties. This contract position will begin in April and be active for one month (assignments may be completed before the contract is scheduled to end). See attached image for all property locations.
Interested applicants must have the following:
â€¢A digital camera or viable smartphone (with ability to capture JPG images)
â€¢High speed Internet for uploading photos
â€¢Reliable transportation (must have a valid license/insurance, or use public transit)
â€¢Microsoft Excel, Google Sheets, or a similar spreadsheet application for assignments
Please be aware that this work is not intended for professional photographers, but some photo experience is recommended.
Assignments on average can contain up to 20-30 properties and photographers are given one week to complete the assignment; however, each assignment generally requires 2 days of work. Approximately 10-15 photos of each property should be taken (from different angles) and uploaded unedited via Dropbox. Each property will take about 15 minutes to photograph as these are exterior shots only.
Multi-Family Base Pay starts at $15.00 per property.
Self-Storage Base Pay starts at $12.50 per property. Additional bonuses available.
Please email me a copy of your resume and let me know the best email to reach you with your application.

title: Consultant Needed: Streamline B2B E-Commerce and Inventory Automation
description:
Project Description: We are a small yet focused merchandise and branded apparel business with a dedicated team of five, processing approximately five to ten orders daily. Our operations support a variety of clients, and we are seeking an experienced consultant to help streamline and automate key processes. Currently, our workflows involve manual steps for inventory tracking, order releases, and invoicing. Weâ€™re eager to explore cost-effective, technology-driven solutions tailored to our needs and scale.
While integration with a large clientâ€™s ERP system (via cXML PunchOut) is a potential future consideration, our immediate priority is automating internal workflows and improving our inventory and order management processes. If applicable, we are open to exploring integration solutions aligned with PunchOut protocols and PromoStandards. More information about PromoStandards can be found at PromoStandards.org.
Key Project Goals: Analyze current workflows, particularly around inventory tracking and order releases.
Recommend and assist in implementing software solutions for B2B e-commerce and inventory management.
Automate processes such as work order creation, inventory adjustments, and invoicing.
Explore and recommend integration solutions like PunchOut protocols and PromoStandards, if applicable.
Example Challenge: One specific process we aim to improve is our apparel release workflow, which is just one example of the broader services we provide to clients. Currently, we bulk produce items efficiently; however, inventory is manually entered into QuickBooks Desktop. When clients request a release, we manually create a "work order" in QuickBooks Desktop to fulfill the shipment, which also adjusts inventory. Shipping costs are then invoiced quarterly, as the products are prepaid on net terms. While this process works, it is time-consuming and labor-intensive. We are looking for modern, technology-driven solutions to streamline these steps and enhance efficiency.
Ideal Candidate: Strong expertise in B2B e-commerce platforms and inventory management systems.
Experience with automation tools and API integrations to improve workflows.  Knowledge of solutions tailored to merchandise or apparel businesses.
Familiarity with tools like ShipStation, PunchOut capabilities, PromoStandards, and ERP systems (preferred but not mandatory).
Deliverables: A detailed analysis of current processes with actionable recommendations for improvement.
Assistance in selecting and implementing software or tools for B2B inventory and order management.
Redesigned workflows to automate and optimize operations.
Support for transitioning to new tools or technologies with minimal disruption.
Budget: Open to proposals based on the complexity and scope of the project.
How to Apply: Please include the following in your proposal:
A summary of your experience with similar projects.
Examples of tools or technologies youâ€™ve implemented for B2B e-commerce or inventory management.
Any experience with PunchOut, PromoStandards, or ERP integrations (if applicable).
An estimated timeline and cost for completion.
Skills Required
eCommerce
Inventory Management
Workflow Consulting
ERP Software
Business Consulting

title: Digital Marketer / Videographer
description:
Job Title: Digital Marketing & Content Specialist
Location: Ventura
Company: Functional Fitness Products / Gym Build USA
Employment Type: Part time with the goal of full time
About Us:
At Functional Fitness Products and Gym Build USA, we specialize in equipping and guiding entrepreneurs in launching successful gyms. We offer top-tier fitness equipment, flooring, and accessories while also providing step-by-step business coaching through Gym Build USA. Our marketing efforts primarily focus on Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube to engage fitness professionals and aspiring gym owners.
Job Summary:
We are seeking a Digital Marketing & Content Specialist to drive our online presence and brand engagement. This role requires expertise in social media marketing, content creation, and basic videography skills to produce high-quality visuals for ads, reels, and YouTube content. The ideal candidate is creative, analytical, and passionate about the fitness industry. This position will also require some travel to capture deliveries and final installations of our products at customer locations.
Key Responsibilities:
Develop, execute, and optimize social media campaigns across Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube.
Plan and create engaging short-form video content (reels, shorts, TikToks) and long-form video content (YouTube) to attract and convert audiences.
Manage paid advertising campaigns on Meta and YouTube, optimizing for lead generation and conversions.
Travel as needed to film product deliveries and gym installations, capturing high-quality content for marketing use.
Edit videos with basic motion graphics, text overlays, and branding elements.
Collaborate with the team to develop marketing strategies that drive traffic, engagement, and sales.
Monitor and analyze campaign performance, adjusting strategies based on data insights.
Stay up to date with trends in digital marketing, video content, and social media algorithms.
Assist in email marketing, blog content creation, and website updates as needed.
Qualifications:
1-3 years of experience in digital marketing, social media management, or content creation.
Proficiency in Facebook Ads Manager, YouTube Ads, and TikTok for Business.
Basic videography and video editing skills using software like Adobe Premiere Pro, CapCut, or Canva.
Strong understanding of fitness industry trends (preferred but not required).
Comfortable with traveling to different locations for content capture.
Excellent writing, storytelling, and creative content skills.
Ability to analyze data and optimize campaigns for better performance.
Highly organized, self-motivated, and able to work independently.
Perks & Benefits:
Competitive salary + performance-based incentives.
Opportunity to work in the fast-growing fitness and business coaching industry.
Flexible work environment (remote or hybrid options available).
Growth opportunities within a rapidly expanding company.
How to Apply:
Please send in your resume

title: E-commerce Website Content Administrator
description:
PLEASE NOTE: This is an on-site position in Southern California ONLY. Absolutely no remote applicants, agencies, companies or freelancers please!
Agena Astro is looking for a full-time (min 30 hrs) product data/content management associate to maintain our Magento website and eBay/Amazon accounts from our office location in Cerritos, CA.
The ideal candidate should have at least 1 year of experience maintaining the product database of Magento, Shopify or similar e-commerce sites. This includes:
* Managing simple/bundle/configurable products (including descriptions, pricing, product images/videos, manuals, related products, etc.)
* Managing product categories, basic SEO, blog articles, etc.
The preferred candidate will have the following skills/attributes:
* Good understanding of HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and Pagebuilder/Wordpress for website content management
* Superb attention to detail and accuracy, and a desire to produce very high quality work
* Very good MS Excel skills, including importing/exporting/conversion between various file types and data cleanup/management
* Very good Photoshop knowledge to edit product photos (crop, square, adjust, annotate, etc.)
* Team player who will be comfortable working with a small team daily and on multiple projects simultaneously with often-changing priorities
* Self-motivated and ready to take on key responsibilities with minimal supervision once trained
To Apply:
* Please send a resume and brief cover letter detailing your interest and qualifications for this job
* Be sure to list the hourly or annual salary that you seek. A range is OK for now.
About Agena Astro:
Agena Astro was founded in 2003 and now offers over 6,000 unique products from the worldâ€™s leading astronomy brands. With our customer-first approach and expert support team, we have gained a reputation for being the highest-rated astronomy shop in North America. We offer medical insurance, paid time off, annual bonus, and a pleasant/collaborative work environment.
Thank you for your interest!

title: Website Designer - Work from home
description:
Fast-growing tech startup SiteSwan is looking for independent resellers to take our unique and proven concept national. No tech experience needed, no salary caps, no crazy hours, no scams - work from home on your own terms doing what you love.
SiteSwan is the fastest and easiest way to create websites for small businesses. Our reseller program enables anyone to launch their own local web design business and make money selling websites to small businesses in their area. Get access to our suite of reseller tools for easier client management, sales and marketing, lead generation, and more!
- Sell just 2 websites per week and you can earn over $100,000
- Sell 3 websites per week and you can earn over $170,000 with $15,000 in monthly residual income using our suggested pricing model
WE PROVIDE ALL THE TECHNOLOGY, TRAINING AND SUPPORT YOU NEED. We are looking for motivated individuals and freelance designers.
Here's what's included:
- Easy-to-use web design software
- 300+ professionally designed website templates
- Your own reseller website
- Sales & marketing materials
- Lead generation
- Ongoing training & tech support
- Huge earning potential
For more information or to get started:
https://opportunity.siteswan.com/?design

title: Wordpress Developer
description:
Job Overview
We are seeking a skilled and motivated WordPress Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in web development, particularly with WordPress, and will be responsible for creating and maintaining high-quality websites. This role requires a blend of technical expertise and creativity to deliver user-friendly and visually appealing web solutions.
Responsibilities
Develop, customize, and maintain WordPress websites to meet client specifications.
Collaborate with designers to implement UI/UX best practices for optimal user experience.
Write clean, efficient code using JavaScript, TypeScript, and PHP.
Manage database interactions using MySQL for dynamic content delivery.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to website performance and functionality.
Stay updated on the latest web development trends and technologies.
Experience
Proven experience in WordPress development with a strong portfolio of completed projects.
Proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, MySQL, and SOAP for application development.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively within a team environment.
Join us in creating innovative web solutions that enhance user engagement and drive business success!
Job Type: Full-time
Benefits:
401(k)
Health insurance
Paid time off
Compensation Package:
Bonus opportunities
Work Location: In person

title: Seeking student to build their portfolio: help build my website PLEASE
description: I have been a business owner of 22+ years. However, my lovely clients over the past five years have decided to short change me every single time. Therefore, I am starting a new business, but I need help. I need a kind, talented, and artistic person to help me with a website. Ideally, you would be someone who has an interest for the arts, vintage, antiques, etc. I am not looking for a cold, basic site. Can you help? I am able to help with internships and college credits if you put me in touch with professors, etc. If the image posted appeals to you- that is my style.

title: looking for an editor
description: My name is Roxas Bhroanain, I am looking for a work for hire editor,  this person will need to submit a portfolio detailing many different aspects of photography from weddings down to long exposures. I need to know what im hiring. I am not looking for one time project or per time project this is an opportunity for a company approved on call editor that is not an employee but a contractor under my company. direct competition will not be accepted you will be my companies contractor and do nothing but work closely with me. I will take shots and you will edit them. terms and conditions of contract will be sent to desirable contractor applicant of choice. contractor will do work remotely and on occasion be held at Venue for meetings. initial meeting and quarterly. our sucesses will be shared together through company events that will be to inspire trusting atmosphere between company and contractor this will.be milestone celebrations and so on. Please apply only if interested in long haul contracting without hire under direct competition and years of building relationship with company through skills and atmosphere.im not looking for a runner. if I wanted one id go to a track

title: Convert photo to painting (several $100 gig)
description:
I want to make a painting out of a photo I took and gift it to someone.
But i want to be part of the creation process so this job will involve me providing the supplies (lmk what you need eg paint, canvas; i will send you the pic and we can discuss), and then we make it together.
I am a rank beginner nor artistically included. We have 8 weeks if we start on april 6th to get this done. You can do the heavy lifting but coach me on simpler aspects of the painting. Open to watercolor/acrylic/oil etc. and style (realistic vs more impressionist etc.) size of painting, we can discuss all of it.
PS. Im getting photoshop inquiries and to be clear this is an actual painting gig we are copying a picture I took onto canvas

title: Comic artist needed
description: Looking for comic book style artists, the writer/filmmaker is looking to develop several comics based on original scripts. Dark DC styled action/superhero themed. Looking to start with a few pages, main poster type page and a couple based on main characters. Approx 4,5 color pages to start. I will provide reference images. This is a low budgeted project. Please let me know your rate.

title: Digital Marketing & Web Design Specialist (Part-Time, In-Person)
description:
Location: Midtown Manhattan, New York (In-Person Meeting Required Weekly)
About Us:
We are a fast-paced, growing medical practice committed to delivering exceptional care and service to our patients. We are looking for a creative, tech-savvy individual to lead our digital presence and help us grow online.
Position Overview:
We are seeking a Digital Marketing & Web Design Specialist who can manage and elevate our online presence through expert website design, engaging social media content, and effective email marketing. The ideal candidate is highly organized, experienced in medical branding or healthcare marketing, and comfortable meeting in person once a week at our Midtown office.
Key Responsibilities:
Design, maintain, and update our website (WordPress or similar platforms)
Develop engaging content for Instagram, Facebook, and other relevant platforms
Plan and execute email marketing campaigns (Mailchimp, Klaviyo, or similar)
Monitor and analyze website and social media metrics to track performance
Create branded graphics, promotional materials, and content for seasonal campaigns
Ensure all content aligns with HIPAA guidelines and the brandâ€™s tone of voice
Attend weekly in-person meetings in Midtown to collaborate with the team and review progress
Requirements:
Proven experience in website design and digital marketing
Strong skills in graphic design tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Suite)
Experience with social media management tools (e.g., Hootsuite, Buffer)
Familiarity with SEO best practices and Google Analytics
Excellent communication and organizational skills
Ability to meet deadlines and work independently
Prior experience in healthcare or medical aesthetics is a plus
Schedule:
Part-time with flexible hours (Weekly in-person meetings required in Midtown)
